Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.testkit.AbstractTestUtil
    Internal interface, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.CassandraConfig
    This class became obsolete and will be removed on next release. Since 1.4.0.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.testkit.AwaitPersistenceInit
    Internal class, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.CassandraContactPoint
    since 1.4.0 - This class became obsolete and will be removed on next release.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.CassandraReadSideProcessor
    Use ReadSideProcessor instead with CassandraReadSide builder. Since 1.2.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.ConfigurationServiceLocator
    use ConfigurationServiceLocator instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.jdbc.testkit.TestUtil
    Internal class, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.testkit.TestUtil
    Internal class, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.jdbc.testkit.TestUtil$
    Internal class, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.testkit.TestUtil$
    Internal class, not intended for direct use. Since 1.5.0.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.server.ServiceGuiceSupport.bindServices(ServiceGuiceSupport.ServiceBinding<?>...)
    support for multiple locatable ServiceDescriptors per Lagom service will be removed. Use ServiceGuiceSupport.bindService(java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.Class<? extends T>) instead
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntityRegistry.eventStream(AggregateEventTag<Event>, Optional<UUID>)
    Use eventStream(AggregateEventTag, Offset) instead. Since 1.2.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.ServiceInfo.getLocatableServices()
    this method will be removed when dropping support for multiple locatable service descriptors per service.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntity.BehaviorBuilder.getState()
    The method is deprecated because it was deemed obsolete. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntityRegistry.gracefulShutdown(FiniteDuration)
    As of Lagom 1.4, this method has no effect and no longer needs to be called

    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.Descriptor.publishing(Descriptor.TopicCall<?>...)
    use Descriptor.withTopics(TopicCall[]) instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.cassandra.CassandraReadSide.register(Class<? extends CassandraReadSideProcessor<Event>>)
    Use the builder method to create and register a Cassandra read side processor.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntity.BehaviorBuilder.setState(State)
    The method is deprecated because it was deemed obsolete. Since 1.5.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntityRef.withAskTimeout(FiniteDuration)
    As of Lagom 1.5. Use PersistentEntityRef.withAskTimeout(Duration) instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.testkit.ServiceTest.Setup.withConfigureBuilder(Function<GuiceApplicationBuilder, GuiceApplicationBuilder>)
    Use configureBuilder instead. Since 1.2.0.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.testkit.ServiceTest.Setup.withPersistence(boolean)
    Use withCassandra instead. Since 1.2.0.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.client.CircuitBreakingServiceLocator(CircuitBreakers)
    Use constructor accepting CircuitBreakersPanel instead
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntityRef(String, ActorRef, ActorSystem, FiniteDuration)
    Use PersistentEntityRef.PersistentEntityRef(String, ActorRef, FiniteDuration) instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntityRef(String, ActorRef, FiniteDuration)
    As of Lagom 1.5. Use PersistentEntityRef.PersistentEntityRef(String, ActorRef, Duration) instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.ServiceInfo(String)
    use ServiceInfo.ServiceInfo(String, PMap) instead.
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.ServiceInfo(String, PMap<String, PSequence<ServiceAcl>>)
    use ServiceInfo.of(String, ServiceAcl...) instead.
